General.Name: Urbanfund Corp
General.Description: Urbanfund Corp. owns, develops, and operates a real estate portfolio for residential and commercial properties in Canada. The company focuses on identifying, evaluating, and investing in real estate and real estate related projects. Its assets are located in Toronto, Belleville, and London, Ontario; and Quebec City and Montreal, Quebec. Urbanfund Corp. was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 35 Lesmill Road, Toronto, ON, Canada, M3B 2T3
